document_notes.text:
This update for openvswitch fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-22563: Fixed memory leak via the function xmalloc__ in /lib/util.c (bsc#1219059).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: openvswitch 2.17.8 was discovered to contain a memory leak via the function xmalloc__ in openvswitch-2.17.8/lib/util.c.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
